mapper.select: select Q2.Zj_Name,nvl(Q2.bb_Amt,0)bb_Amt,nvl(Q2.bb_Qz_Num,0)bb_Qz_Num,nvl(Qz_Rate,0)Qz_Rate from (select q1.ZJ_OLD Zj_Name,count(*) as bb_Amt, sum(case when q1.DOWN_SPEED in ('1024000Kbps') then 1 else 0 end) as bb_Qz_Num, sum(case when q1.DOWN_SPEED in ('1024000Kbps') then 1 else 0 end)/count(*) as Qz_Rate from (select s.*,D.ZJ_OLD from XFY_RPT_KD_ORDER_DETAIL s left join XFY_REP_PUB_ZJ_CON D on D.Zj_New = S.ZJ_AREA_NAME where s.cpl_dt >= #{startDate} and s.cpl_dt <= #{endDate} AND S.CACCT_ID not in ('2742039410352','2742043400287','2742043679717','2742037917799','2742037919610','2742039829735','2742037919567','2742025286104','2742025284266' ,'2742035055805','2742025290416','2741049732135','2741049732180','2741049732096','2741049732132','2741049666670','2741049580116') ) Q1 where q1.ZJ_OLD NOT IN ('鄞州政企部','鄞州分公司未落地','鄞州分公司本级','合计') group by q1.ZJ_OLD order by q1.ZJ_OLD desc )Q2 UNION ALL select Zj_Name,bb_Amt,bb_Qz_Num,Qz_Rate from (select '合计' Zj_Name,nvl(count(*),0) bb_Amt, sum(case when s.DOWN_SPEED in ('1024000Kbps') then 1 else 0 end) as bb_Qz_Num, sum(case when s.DOWN_SPEED in ('1024000Kbps') then 1 else 0 end)/count(*) as Qz_Rate from XFY_RPT_KD_ORDER_DETAIL s where s.cpl_dt >= #{startDate} and s.cpl_dt <= #{endDate} AND S.CACCT_ID not in ('2742039410352','2742043400287','2742043679717','2742037917799','2742037919610','2742039829735','2742037919567','2742025286104','2742025284266' ,'2742035055805','2742025290416','2741049732135','2741049732180','2741049732096','2741049732132','2741049666670','2741049580116') ) Q3

select Q2.Zj_Name,nvl(Q2.bb_Amt,0)bb_Amt,nvl(Q2.bb_Qz_Num,0)bb_Qz_Num,nvl(Qz_Rate,0)Qz_Rate from (select Zj_Name,count(*) as bb_Amt, sum(case when q1.DOWN_SPEED in ('1024000Kbps') then 1 else 0 end) as bb_Qz_Num, sum(case when q1.DOWN_SPEED in ('1024000Kbps') then 1 else 0 end)/count(*) as Qz_Rate from (select s.*,case when b.JOB is null then '其他'else b.JOB end Zj_Name from XFY_RPT_KD_ORDER_DETAIL s left join XFY_REP_PUB_CDRY B ON s.MKT_EMPLOYEE_ID=B.MKT_NAME where s.cpl_dt >= #{startDate} and s.cpl_dt <= #{endDate} AND S.CACCT_ID not in ('2742039410352','2742043400287','2742043679717','2742037917799','2742037919610','2742039829735','2742037919567','2742025286104','2742025284266' ,'2742035055805','2742025290416','2741049732135','2741049732180','2741049732096','2741049732132','2741049666670','2741049580116') ) Q1 group by q1.Zj_Name order by decode(q1.Zj_Name,'支局长',0,'支局长助理',1,'网格经理',2,'营业员',3,'智家工程师',4,'行客经理',5,'支局其他',6,'商客经理',7,'特攻队',8) )Q2

select * from (select l6.Zj_Name,l6.rh_Amt,l6.rh_Qz_Num,l6.Qz_Rate,l6.rh_Qz_Avg_Tar from (select l8.*,l7.ZJ_KD_QZ_RH rh_Qz_Avg_Tar from (select D.ZJ_OLD as Zj_Name,count(*) rh_Amt,sum(case when s.KD_SPEED in ('1024000Kbps') then 1 else 0 end)rh_Qz_Num, sum(case when s.KD_SPEED in ('1024000Kbps') then 1 else 0 end)/count(*) Qz_Rate from XFY_RPT_RH_ORDER_ASSET s left join XFY_REP_PUB_ZJ_CON D on D.Zj_New = S.BRANCH_AREA_NAME where s.cpl_dt >= #{startDate} and s.cpl_dt <= #{endDate} and s.prom_amt>=129 and D.Zj_New NOT IN ('鄞州政企部','鄞州分公司未落地','鄞州分公司本级','合计') group by D.ZJ_OLD order by D.ZJ_OLD desc)l8 left join XFY_REP_PUB_TARGET l7 on l8.Zj_Name=l7.ZJ_ABBR_NAME) l6 order by l6.Zj_Name desc) l5 union all select l10.Zj_Name,l10.rh_Amt,l10.rh_Qz_Num,l10.Qz_Rate,l9.ZJ_KD_QZ_RH rh_Qz_Avg_Tar from (select '合计' as Zj_Name,count(*) rh_Amt,sum(case when s.KD_SPEED in ('1024000Kbps') then 1 else 0 end)rh_Qz_Num, sum(case when s.KD_SPEED in ('1024000Kbps') then 1 else 0 end)/count(*) Qz_Rate from XFY_RPT_RH_ORDER_ASSET s where s.cpl_dt >= #{startDate} and s.cpl_dt <= #{endDate} and s.prom_amt>=129) l10 left join XFY_REP_PUB_TARGET l9 on l10.Zj_Name=l9.ZJ_ABBR_NAME

select l8.* from (select case when b.JOB is null then '其他'else b.JOB end as Zj_Name,count(*) rh_Amt,sum(case when s.KD_SPEED in ('1024000Kbps') then 1 else 0 end)rh_Qz_Num, sum(case when s.KD_SPEED in ('1024000Kbps') then 1 else 0 end)/count(*) Qz_Rate from XFY_RPT_RH_ORDER_ASSET s left join XFY_REP_PUB_CDRY B ON s.MKT_EMPLOYEE_ID=B.MKT_NAME where s.cpl_dt >= #{startDate} and s.cpl_dt <= #{endDate} and s.prom_amt>=129 group by case when b.JOB is null then '其他'else b.JOB end order by case when b.JOB is null then '其他'else b.JOB end desc)l8

select * from (select D.ZJ_OLD Zj_Name,count(*)cl_Amt from XFY_KD_CL_QZ s left join XFY_REP_PUB_ZJ_CON D on D.Zj_New = S.AREA_NAME_LV5 where s.cpl_dt >= #{startDate} and s.cpl_dt <= #{endDate} and D.ZJ_OLD is not null and D.ZJ_OLD NOT IN ('鄞州政企部','鄞州分公司未落地','鄞州分公司本级','合计') and s.MKT_EMPLOYEE_NAME !='罗益宁' group by D.ZJ_OLD order by D.ZJ_OLD desc ) union all select '合计' Zj_Name,count(*)cl_Amt from XFY_KD_CL_QZ s where s.cpl_dt >= #{startDate} and s.cpl_dt <= #{endDate} and s.MKT_EMPLOYEE_NAME !='罗益宁'

select case when b.JOB is null then '其他'else b.JOB end as Zj_Name,count(*) cl_Amt from XFY_KD_CL_QZ s right join XFY_REP_PUB_CDRY B ON s.MKT_EMPLOYEE_ID=B.MKT_NAME where s.cpl_dt >= #{startDate} and s.cpl_dt <= #{endDate} and s.MKT_EMPLOYEE_NAME !='罗益宁' group by case when b.JOB is null then '其他'else b.JOB end order by decode(case when b.JOB is null then '其他'else b.JOB end,'支局长',0,'支局长助理',1,'网格经理',2,'营业员',3,'智家工程师',4,'行客经理',5,'支局其他',6,'商客经理',7,'特攻队',8)

select * from (select a.ZJ_NAME,count(*) bb_amt,sum(case when b.SPEED in ('1024000Kbps') then 1 else 0 end) as bb_Qz_Num, sum(case when b.SPEED in ('1024000Kbps') then 1 else 0 end)/count(*) bb_Qz_Rate, sum(case when p1.BB_DATAUSERNAME is not null then 1 else 0 end) XGPON_Num, sum(case when p1.BB_DATAUSERNAME is not null then 1 else 0 end)/count(*) XGPON_Rate from XFY_RPT_RH_TEMP_169 s LEFT JOIN XFY_RPT_RH_TEMP_169_QZ a on a.GIS=s.WG_ID left join XFY_KD_ASSET b on s.KD_ASSET_ROW_ID=b.ASSET_ROW_ID left join XFY_RPT_RH_TEMP_169_XGPON p1 on p1.BB_DATAUSERNAME=s.KD_DATA_USER_NAME group by a.ZJ_NAME order by a.ZJ_NAME) l1 union all select '合计' ZJ_NAME,count(*) bb_amt,sum(case when b.SPEED in ('1024000Kbps') then 1 else 0 end) as bb_Qz_Num, sum(case when b.SPEED in ('1024000Kbps') then 1 else 0 end)/count(*) bb_Qz_Rate ,sum(case when p1.BB_DATAUSERNAME is not null then 1 else 0 end) XGPON_Num, sum(case when p1.BB_DATAUSERNAME is not null then 1 else 0 end)/count(*) XGPON_Rate from XFY_RPT_RH_TEMP_169 s LEFT JOIN XFY_RPT_RH_TEMP_169_QZ a on a.GIS=s.WG_ID left join XFY_KD_ASSET b on s.KD_ASSET_ROW_ID=b.ASSET_ROW_ID left join XFY_RPT_RH_TEMP_169_XGPON p1 on p1.BB_DATAUSERNAME=s.KD_DATA_USER_NAME
